abstract: A group of workers in the automotive department of a Wal-Mart store in Canada became the first North American employees of Wal-Mart to be covered by a union contract.
snippet: A group of workers in the automotive department of a Wal-Mart store in Canada became the first North American employees of Wal-Mart to be covered by a union contract.
lead_paragraph: GATINEAU, Quebec  A handful of workers in the automotive department of a Wal-Mart Canada store have become the only North American employees of the giant retailer to be covered by a union contract.

headline.main: Union Wins Contract for 8 Workers at Wal-Mart Canada
headline.print_headline: Union Wins a Contract At Wal-Mart Canada
